from morphforge.core import LocMgr, FileIO
from morphforge.core.misc import SeqUtils
import pickle



[docs]class SimulationResult(object):

    """ traces is a list of trace Objects"""


[docs]    def __init__(self, traces,evsets, simulation):
        self.traces = traces
        self.evsets = evsets
        self.simulation = simulation
        self.t_start = None
        self.t_stop = None


    @property

[docs]    def hocfilename(self):
        return self.simulation.hocfilename



[docs]    def set_simulation_time(self, t_start, t_stop):
        self.t_start = t_start
        self.t_stop = t_stop



[docs]    def get_trace(self, obj):
        # Get the results by string:
        if isinstance(obj, basestring):
            return SeqUtils.filter_expect_single( self.traces, lambda s: s.name == obj)

        # Get the results by Recordable object:
        else:
            return self.get_trace(obj.name)



[docs]    def get_evset(self, obj):
        # Get the results by string:
        if isinstance(obj, basestring):
            return SeqUtils.filter_expect_single( self.evsets, lambda s: s.name == obj)

        else:
            assert False




[docs]    def get_traces(self):
        return self.traces

    # Loading & Saving:


[docs]    def save_to_file(self, filename):
        res_string = pickle.dumps(self)
        return FileIO.write_to_file(
                res_string,
                filename=filename,
                filedirectory=LocMgr.get_simulation_tmp_dir())


    @classmethod

[docs]    def load_from_file(cls, filename):
        return pickle.load(open(filename))




[docs]    def add_evset(self, evset):
        self.evsets.append(evset)
